elements.text:
You are outside on a cool day and see your friends down the street. You decide to jog over to say hi. When you get to your friends, you feel out of breath.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: I am able to keep a good pace on this jog.
It is so beautiful out today.
My friends might judge me for gasping a little when I get to them, but they probably won't.
I feel like I'm going to die from being out of breath, but I know I won't.
My friends will think I'm out of shape because I need to catch my breath.
